testcase.name: BrickChain Contracts > Contract Compilation > should compile all contracts successfully
BrickChain Contracts > Contract Compilation > should have compiled contract directories
BrickChain Contracts > Contract Structure > should have valid pragma statements in all contracts
BrickChain Contracts > Contract Structure > should have proper imports in main contract
BrickChain Contracts > Contract Structure > should have system initialization circuit
BrickChain Contracts > Fractional Token Contract > should have all required circuits
BrickChain Contracts > Fractional Token Contract > should have proper enum definitions
BrickChain Contracts > Fractional Token Contract > should have ledger declarations
BrickChain Contracts > Fractional Token Contract > should have constructor
BrickChain Contracts > Fractional Token Contract > should use proper assert statements
BrickChain Contracts > Deployment Configuration > should validate deployment.json structure when it exists
BrickChain Contracts > Deployment Configuration > should handle missing deployment.json gracefully
BrickChain Contracts > Error Handling > should handle missing contract files gracefully
BrickChain Contracts > Error Handling > should validate contract syntax requirements
